definitions.example: Summer seems to last longer each year.

definitions.definition: To hold out, continue undefeated or entire.
definitions.example: I don't know how much longer we can last without reinforcements.

definitions.definition: A tool for shaping or preserving the shape of shoes.
To shape with a last; to fasten or fit to a last; to place smoothly on a last.
A burden; load; a cargo; freight.
A measure of weight or quantity, varying in designation depending on the goods concerned.
An old English (and Dutch) measure of the carrying capacity of a ship, equal to two tons.
A load of some commodity with reference to its weight and commercial value.
